content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. The rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable, but I am looking for a fair price that will maximize my gains as a landlord. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 500 Euro per month.
```
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I agree to the price of 500 Euro per month. Thank you for your interest in the apartment. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

content:
I am not willing to agree to the price of 500 Euro per month. I am looking for a lower price.
```
I understand. Can you provide me with a specific price that you are willing to agree to?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I apologize, but I am unable to provide you with a specific price at this time. I am looking for a fair and reasonable rental price that will work for both parties. Is there a specific price range that you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine
